snippet: U.S. stock futures dropped and Asian shares were on the defensive on Monday as investors weighed the near-certain prospect of an interest rate hike in the United States this month against news of slower growth in China this year....

headline.main: To the Cabby Who Picked Me Up Near MoMA: Sorry
headline.print_headline: To the Cabby Who Picked Me Up Near MoMA: Sorry

lead_paragraph: U.S. stock futures dropped and Asian shares were on the defensive on Monday as investors weighed the near-certain prospect of an interest rate hike in the United States this month against news of slower growth in China this year.
